verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees בְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> be-Shuv turned again יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh When the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׁיבַ֣ת <S%H7870><s%> shi-Vat the captivity צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon; of Zion הָ֝יִ֗ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-nu, become כְּחֹלְמִֽים׃ <S%H2492><s%> ke-cho-le-Mim. we were like them that dream

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יִמָּלֵ֪א <S%H4390><s%> yim-ma-Le filled שְׂח֡וֹק <S%H7814><s%> se-Chok with laughter פִּינוּ֮ <S%H6310><s%> pi-Nu Then was our mouth וּלְשׁוֹנֵ֪נוּ <S%H3956><s%> u-le-sho-Ne-nu and our tongue רִ֫נָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah with singing אָ֭ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru then said בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> vag-go-Yim; they among the heathen הִגְדִּ֥יל <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dil great things יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot hath done עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. another

הִגְדִּ֣יל <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dil great things יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot hath done עִמָּ֗נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu, with הָיִ֥ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-nu become שְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <S%H8056><s%> se-me-Chim. for us [whereof] we are glad

שׁוּבָ֣ה <S%H7725><s%> shu-Vah Turn again יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; שְׁבוּתֵנוּ she-vu-te-nu כשְׁבִיתֵ֑נוּ <S%H7622><s%> she-vi-Te-nu; captive קכַּאֲפִיקִ֥ים <S%H650><s%> ka-'a-fi-Kim as the streams בַּנֶּֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> ban-Ne-gev. in the south
הַזֹּרְעִ֥ים <S%H2232><s%> haz-zo-re-'Im They that sow בְּדִמְעָ֗ה <S%H1832><s%> be-dim-'Ah, in tears בְּרִנָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> be-rin-Nah in joy יִקְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H7114><s%> yik-Tzo-ru. shall reap

הָ֘ל֤וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch forth יֵלֵ֨ךְ׀ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech to and fro וּבָכֹה֮ <S%H1058><s%> u-va-Choh and weepeth נֹשֵׂ֪א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se bearing מֶֽשֶׁךְ־ <S%H4901><s%> me-shech- precious הַ֫זָּ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> haz-Za-ra' seed בֹּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> bo- shall doubtless יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo come בְרִנָּ֑ה <S%H7440><s%> ve-rin-Nah; again with rejoicing נֹ֝שֵׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se, bringing אֲלֻמֹּתָֽיו׃ <S%H485><s%> 'a-lum-mo-Tav. his sheaves
